metadata.description: Spells that create, heal, and enhance animals and animal products

spells.name: Summon the Loyal Beast
spells.description: Creates a wolf or similar predator that serves the caster loyally for the duration. The animal has normal statistics and intelligence but obeys simple commands.

spells.name: Heal the Ferocious Bear
spells.description: Heals all wounds on an animal, from light scratches to near-fatal injuries. The animal is restored to perfect health instantly.

spells.name: Blessing of the Abundant Herd
spells.description: Ensures that a herd of animals (cattle, sheep, etc.) remains healthy and reproduces successfully. Animals are protected from disease and predators.

spells.name: Create the Perfect Steed
spells.description: Creates an exceptional horse with superior strength, speed, and endurance. The steed is perfectly trained and loyal to its rider.
spells.guidelines: Base 15 (create superior animal), +1 Touch, +3 Moon, +1 for exceptional qualities

spells.name: Swarm of Protective Bees
spells.description: Creates a swarm of bees that attack the caster's enemies while leaving allies unharmed. The bees cause distraction and minor damage.

spells.name: Mend the Broken Wing
spells.description: Heals a single light or medium wound on an animal, mending broken bones and closing cuts. Cannot heal disease or deprivation damage.

spells.name: Guardian of the Sacred Grove
spells.description: Creates a powerful animal guardian (bear, wolf, or great cat) that protects a specific location. The creature is intelligent and can distinguish friends from foes.
spells.guidelines: Base 20 (create intelligent animal), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +1 Herbam requisite

spells.name: Blessing of Abundant Wool
spells.description: Causes a sheep or similar animal to grow exceptionally fine, abundant wool. The animal produces three times the normal amount of high-quality fiber.

spells.name: Purify the Diseased Flesh
spells.description: Removes all disease from an animal, restoring it to perfect health. Also neutralizes poisons and toxins affecting the creature.

spells.name: Create the Messenger Bird
spells.description: Creates an intelligent bird that can carry messages over long distances and return to the caster. The bird understands simple instructions.
spells.guidelines: Base 10 (create intelligent animal), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 Mentem requisite

spells.name: Strengthen the Working Beast
spells.description: Doubles an animal's natural strength and endurance for heavy labor. The animal can work twice as long without fatigue and carry heavier loads.
spells.guidelines: Base 5 (enhance physical abilities), +1 Touch, +2 Sun, +1 for significant enhancement

spells.name: Birth the Perfect Offspring
spells.description: Ensures that a pregnant animal gives birth to healthy, superior offspring with enhanced traits. The young are born stronger, faster, and more intelligent than normal.
